name: Enigma (itch) (gamma_delta)
description:
Welcome to my entry to the 2020 GMTK Game Jam: Enigma!

Try and control your robot using your rapidly dwindling supply of keys.

  • Click on the robot to open its board. Click on a key to pick it up, and click it again in a slot to drop it there. Click outside the board to return to the world.
  • Number keys are lighter-colored than letter keys. There aren't any punctuation keys.
  • The 6 slots on the left are your controls. From top to bottom:
    • Move up
    • Move down
    • Move left
    • Move right
    • Steam Blast
    • Grenade
  • The Steam Blast is a short-range, weak attack.
  • The Grenade is a powerful explosion that does splash damage. Don't hit yourself with it!
  • The slot above the gauge sacrifices one of your keys in return for a grenade. The gauge shows your remaining grenades.
  • Whenever you take damage, you lose some of your keys.
  • Stay alive and try and beat my highscore!

Leaderboard:

  • Me: 22884

It's called Enigma because of the Enigma machine. Plugging in keys into different spots reminded me of it!
